page.title: 19LOCAL EVENTS
page.content: Our {school}had a visit from a{Greek {Monk}his name is {Father Athenagoras, he described his way of life,and how it differed here from every day life in{Greece,}and why he chose to live in a{Monastery,}He also wrote his name in Greek,{Father Athenagoras}lives{7000 {feet}upon a{Mountain.}He also went to a {disco}at Gedney Drove End. He stayed for a week as a guest of our new vicar{Mr.A.Hawes.} Lutton school have been invited to do a display at the{East Of England Show. We are doing a{Gymnastics and P.E {display.}We are doing it as part of the Education Exhibitions.There are 28 girls and boys taking part,they are doing a warm up then 8 girls are doing a set of pairs balances,the infants are doing an apparatus routine.
